ComicInfo.Summary:
The Immortal Enemy has taken over the body of Gilad Anni-Padda! The now desperate Geomancer, Geoff McHenry, will have to enlist the help of some old and trusted allies to stop this ages old evil the only way they can-- by killing the Eternal Warrior!
Our hero's immortal body-swapping enemy takes him over! Will the Geomancer survive?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-13-labyrinth-of-the-mind/4000-37576/

ComicInfo.Title: Labyrinth of the Mind
